channel.title: 翻譯 on 抱甕舘
channel.description: Recent content in 翻譯 on 抱甕舘

item.title: Johan von Bronx歌詞試譯
item.description: Johan von Bronx Don’t forget the wrong guy in the lineup 別忘了那傢伙在隊裏是錯誤 Tryin’ hard to be strong always rolling over 努力着變得堅強往往又屈服 I will try guitar out, quoting scripture 我會試着彈彈吉他，引經據典 Soon you won’t have memories, only pictures

item.title: River of Brakelights 歌詞試譯
item.description: River of Brakelights We might be in for a late night 我們可能滯身某個夜間 Stuck in a lava flow of brake lights 掙不脫剎車燈匯成熔岩 I can hear a rattling bass drum 我聽見嘈嘈低鳴的底鼓 Driving back to where it came from 正驅動着返回它
